main_tasks:
1.	Implement & optimize RF device drivers and RF software to control RF transceivers & RFFE components.
2.	Provide technical assistance to customers evaluation and design of MediaTek technology
3.	Review customer's modification for the related RF Driver & RF SW.
4.	Analyze customers’ requirements and issues to provide technical solutions
5.	Perform technical presentations and training to customers
requirements:
1.	B.S. in Electrical Engineering or related field.
2.	5+ years of experience in RF system development or related work.
3.	Knowledge of mobile communications in 4G/5G 3GPP RF spec.
4.	Good understanding of RF physical layer & RF transceiver architecture.
5.	In-depth Knowledge of RF SW debugging skill & RF calibration algorithm.
6.	Nice to have fluent English speaking & good communication skill
jd:
Welcome to a world of opportunity!

MediaTek is always looking for talented people to work in our corporate offices around the world. We’re headquartered in Taiwan, but we also have sales and research subsidiaries in Mainland China, US, UK, Finland, Sweden, India, Japan, South Korea and Singapore.

We offer competitive salaries, a range of benefits and personalized programs for professional development.


주요업무
1.	Implement & optimize RF device drivers and RF software to control RF transceivers & RFFE components.
2.	Provide technical assistance to customers evaluation and design of MediaTek technology
3.	Review customer's modification for the related RF Driver & RF SW.
4.	Analyze customers’ requirements and issues to provide technical solutions
5.	Perform technical presentations and training to customers

자격요건
1.	B.S. in Electrical Engineering or related field.
2.	5+ years of experience in RF system development or related work.
3.	Knowledge of mobile communications in 4G/5G 3GPP RF spec.
4.	Good understanding of RF physical layer & RF transceiver architecture.
5.	In-depth Knowledge of RF SW debugging skill & RF calibration algorithm.
6.	Nice to have fluent English speaking & good communication skill

혜택 및 복지
• 가족 경조사 지원 (배우자 포함)
• 패밀리데이 운영
• 결혼, 출산 선물 제공
• 종합병원 건강검진 제공 (연 1회)
• 교육비,통신비,동호회비, 여름휴가비 지원
• 명절, 생일 상품권 지급
